summary: Defines a set of Pydantic data models that represent the components of a static application security testing (SAST) report—such as functions, data flows, match locations, metadata, and points—and supplies helpers to serialize these models into plain dictionaries for storage or transmission.
business_intent: Provide a structured, serializable representation of SAST findings so that security scanning results can be easily generated, persisted, and consumed by downstream reporting or integration tools.
